origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'StockMarketAnalyzer.get_trending_sectors', 'description': 'Get a list of sectors expected to benefit from a specific trend in the next two years.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'trend', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The trend to analyze, e.g., '消费升级'.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'sectors', 'description': 'A list of sectors expected to benefit from the trend.'}]}, {'name': 'StockMarketAnalyzer.get_top_companies', 'description': 'Get a list of companies with high market share in a specific sector.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector to analyze.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'companies', 'description': 'A list of companies with high market share in the sector.'}]}, {'name': 'StockMarketAnalyzer.analyze_brand_value', 'description': 'Analyze the brand value and market competitiveness of a company.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The company to analyze.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the brand value and market competitiveness analysis.'}]}, {'name': 'StockMarketAnalyzer.provide_investment_advice', 'description': 'Provide investment advice based on the analysis results.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'analysis_results', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The analysis results to base the advice on.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'advice', 'description': 'A list of investment advice based on the analysis.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解中国A股市场未来两年内的投资机会。首先，获取未来两年内可能受益于消费升级的行业名单。然后，获取这些行业中具有高市场份额的公司名单。接着，分析这些公司的品牌价值，评估其市场竞争力。最后，基于分析结果，提供一些具体的投资建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取未来两年内可能受益于消费升级的行业名单。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'trend'的值是什么?
